pages.text: $(item)Funnels/$ can be used to move items in and out of inventories. They can be placed on any side of a block with an inventory, and their direction can be configured with the $(bold)$(l:getting_started/create_tools#wrench)Wrench/$. The arrows on the sides of the $(item)Funnel/$ will tell you which direction it is facing.$(ponder)

Basic $(item)Funnels/$ made of Andesite can only transfer single items, and cannot filter items. See $(bold)$(l:advanced_automation/adv_transport#brass_funnel)Brass Funnels/$ for filtering and mass item transfer.
